ConfigBinder - Class in io.github.upendramanike.safeconfig
Reflection-based binder that populates a configuration class from a ConfigSource.

ConfigBindingException - Exception in io.github.upendramanike.safeconfig
Thrown when configuration binding fails, for example because of missing required values or type conversion problems.

ConfigProperty - Annotation Interface in io.github.upendramanike.safeconfig
Declares how a field in a configuration class should be bound from key/value sources.
ConfigSource - Interface in io.github.upendramanike.safeconfig
Simple abstraction over a key/value configuration source.
